Name: Siddaramaiah
Tweet: PM: What is the way to Karnataka Assembly? Chanakya: Go straight on BSY Road. Drop BSY at Varuna. Turn Right at Deve Gowda circle. Then make a U Turn & drop Deve Gowda. Rest at Cariappa circle. No it Is Thimmaiah circle. Then make another U Turn .. PM: Karnatak is very confusing!  https://t.co/0BZYBOnnjR
